annotations.div: * 1.1 μῆνιν : #lex this expresses #neg grudge. #character Achilles feels #neg anger. * 1.2 οὐλομένην : #narrator the_poet feels #quite_neg anger. * 1.2 ἄλγε: #lex this expresses #neg pain. #character Achaeans feel #neg anxiety. * 1.3 ἰφθίμους ψυχὰς : #narrator the_poet, #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel #quite_pos admiration. * 1.3 Ἄϊδι προΐαψεν : #narrator the_poet, #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel #neg sorrow. * 1.4 ἑλώρια τεῦχε κύνεσσιν 1.5 οἰωνοῖσί : #narrator the_poet, #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #narrator I feel #neg repulsion, pity, impiety. * 1.6 ἐρίσαντε : #lex this expresses #neg anger, discord. #character Achilles feels #neg hostile for Agamemnon. #character Agamemnon feels #neg hostile for Achilles. * 1.8 ἔριδι : #lex this expresses #neg anger, discord. * 1.9 χολωθεὶς: #lex this expresses #neg anger. #character Achiles feels anger for Agamemnon. * 1.10 ὀλέκοντο ~ λαοί : #narrator the_poet, #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel sorrow.

* 1.11 ἠτίμασεν : #lex this expresses #quite_neg shame, humiliation. #character Chryses feels #neg humiliation. * 1.15 λίσσετο : #lex this expresses #neu request. * 1.15 λίσσετο ... 1.16 δύω : #narrator the_poet, #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel #neg pity. * 1.16 κοσμήτορε λαῶν : #narrator the_poet, #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel #pos admiration, awe. * 1.20 παῖδα δ’ ἐμοὶ λύσαιτε φίλην : #narrator Chryses expresses #neu request, #pos love, #neg self_pity . #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel #neg compassion. * 1.20 φίλην : #lex this expresses #pos love.

* 1.21 ἁζόμενοι : #lex this expresses #pos awe, piety. * 1.22 ἐπευφήμησαν : #lex this expresses #pos approval, respect, willingness. #character Achaeans feel #pos being_moved. * 1.23 αἰδεῖσθαί : #lex this expresses #pos respect, awe. #character Achaeans feel fear, respect, awe. * 1.24 ἥνδανε : #lex this expresses #pos approval, agreement. * 1.24 οὐκ ~ ἥνδανε θυμῷ : #character Agamemnon feels #quite_neg disapproval, disagreement for Acheans. * 1.25 ἀλλὰ ... ἔτελλε : #narrator Agamemnon feels #neg anger, disdain for Chryses. #character Chryses feels #neg threat, insecurity. #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel fury, shame, reproach for Agamemenon. #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel empathy, injustice for Chryses. * 1.28 μή νύ ... θεοῖο : #character Agamemnon feels #neg disdain, contempt, impiety. #recipient the_ancient_audience feels #neg shame, fury, reproach for Agamemnon.

* 1.31 λέχος : #lex this expresses lust. * 1.32 ἀλλ’ ... νέηαι : #narrator Agamemnon feels #neg anger for Chryses. #character Chryses feels #neg threat. #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel shame, reproach for Agamemenon. #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel empathy, injustice for Chryses. * 1.32 ἐρέθιζε : #lex this expresses #neg anger, fury. #character Agamemnon feels #neg anger, fury for Chryses. * 1.33 ἔδεισεν : #lex this expresses #neg fear. #character Chryses feels #neg fear. * 1.34 βῆ δ’ ἀκέων : #character Chryses feels #neg humiliation, retreat, rejection. #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel #neg empathy, injustice for Chryses. * 1.35 ἠρᾶθ’ : #lex this expresses #neu request, plea. * 1.36 κλῦθί : #character Chryses expresses #neu request, plea.

* 1.42 τίσειαν : #lex this expresses justice. #narrator Chrisis feels #pos revenge, #neg revenge for Achaeans. * 1.42 δάκρυα : #lex this expresses #neg sadness, sorrow. #narrator Chryses feels #neg sadness, sorrow. * 1.43 εὐχόμενος : #lex this expresses #neu request, plea. #character Chryses expresses #neu request, plea. * 1.44 βῆ ~ καρήνων χωόμενος κῆρ : #character Apollo feels #neg fury, anger. * 1.44 χωόμενος : #lex this expresses #neg fury, anger. * 1.46 χωομένοιο : #lex this expresses #neg fury, anger. #character Apollo feels #neg fury, anger. * 1.48 ἰὸν ἕηκε : #lex this expresses #neg aggression. #character Apollo feels #neg aggression, fury, anger. * 1.50 ἐπῴχετο : #lex this expresses #neg aggression, threat.

* 1.51 βέλος ... 1.52 βάλλ’ : #lex this expresses #neg aggression. #character Apollo feels #neg aggression, fury, anger. #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel #neg anxiety, fear. * 1.52 αἰεὶ ... θαμειαί : #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel #neg sadness, sorrow. * 1.56 κήδετο : #lex this expresses #pos affection, love, compassion for Achaeans. * 1.56 θνήσκοντας ὁρᾶτο : #character Hera feels #neg worry, anxiety, sorrow for Achaeans.

* 1.61 εἰ ... Ἀχαιούς : #narrator Achilles feels #neg anxiety, worry. #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel #neg worry, anxiety, fear. * 1.64 τόσσον ... Ἀπόλλων : #character Apollo feels #neg aggression, fury, anger. #narrator Achilles feels #neg worry, bemusement. * 1.65 εὐχωλῆς : #lex this expresses #pos respect, piety. * 1.65 ἑκατόμβης : #lex this expresses #pos respect, piety. * 1.67 ἡμῖν ἀπὸ λοιγὸν ἀμῦναι : #narrator Achilles feels #pos expectation, hope. * 1.69 ἄριστος : #lex this expresses #pos admiration.

* 1.75 μῆνιν : #lex this expresses #neg anger, fury. #character Apollo feels #neg anger, fury. * 1.78 ὀΐομαι ἄνδρα χολωσέμεν : #narrator Calchas feels #neg worry. * 1.78 χολωσέμεν : #lex this expresses #neg anger, fury, aggrevation. #character Chalcas causes #neg anger, fury to Agamemnon. * 1.78 πάντων ... 1.79 κρατέει : #lex this expresses admiration, awe, #neg fear. * 1.80 κρείσσων ... χέρηϊ : #narrator Calchas, #character Achaeans, Argives, #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel #neg threat, fear.

* 1.81 χόλον : #lex this expresses #neg anger, fury. * 1.82 κότον : #lex this expresses #neg anger, grudge. * 1.81 εἴ περ ... 1.83 ἑοῖσι : #narrator Calchas feels #neg worry, fear, threat. * 1.83 φράσαι εἴ με σαώσεις : #narrator Calchas expresses #neu request, expectation for Achilles. * 1.85 θαρσήσας : #lex this expresses #pos bravery, courage. #character Calchas feels #pos bravery. #narrator Achilles expresses #quite_pos encouragement for Calchas. * 1.89 βαρείας χεῖρας ἐποίσει : #lex this expresses #neg aggression, anger. * 1.88 οὔ τις ~ 1.89 σοὶ ~ βαρείας χεῖρας ἐποίσει : #narrator Achilles feels #pos willingness, bravery.

* 1.91 ἄριστος: #lex this expresses #pos admiration. * 1.92 θάρσησε : #lex this expresses #pos bravery, courage. #character Calchas feels #pos bravery. * 1.93 εὐχωλῆς : #lex this expresses #pos respect, piety. * 1.93 ἑκατόμβης : #lex this expresses #pos respect, piety. * 1.94 ἠτίμησ’ : #lex this expresses #neg humiliation, disrespect. #character Agamemnon feels #neg humiliation, disrespect for Chryses. * 1.96 ἄλγε’ ἔδωκεν : #lex this expresses #neg aggression. #character Apollo feels #neg anger, revenge for Agamemnon. * 1.96 ἔτι δώσει : #narator Achilles feels #neg worry, threat. * 1.98 φίλῳ : #lex this expresses #pos affection, love. * 1.99 ἱερὴν ἑκατόμϐην : #lex this expresses #pos respect, piety. * 1.100 ἱλασσάμενοι : #lex this expresses #quite_neg remorse, guilt, submission. #narrator Achilles, #character Achaeans feel #quite_neg remorse, guilt, submission, #quite_pos appeasement.

* 1.103 ἀχνύμενος : #lex this expresses #quite_neg annoyance, irritation, anger. #character Agamemnon feels #quite_neg annoyance, irritation, anger. * 1.103 μένεος : #lex this expressis #neg anger, rage. * 1.103 μένεος ... 1.104 ἐΐκτην : #character Agamemnon feels #neg anger, rage. #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_current_audience, #annotator I feel #neg fear, awe. * 1.105 κάκ᾿ ὀσσόμενος : #character Agamemnon feels #neg aggression, anger for Calchas. * 1.106 μάντι κακῶν: #narrator Agamemnon feels #neg aggression, anger, complaint for Calchas. * 1.106 οὐ πώ ... εἶπας: #narrator Agamemnon feels #neg aggression, anger, complaint for Calchas. * 1.107 φίλα φρεσὶ : #lex this expresses #pos joy, satisfaction. #character Calchas feels #pos joy, satisfaction. * 1.107 αἰεί ... μαντεύεσθαι : #narrator Agamemnon feels #neg aggression, anger, complaint, sarcasm for Calchas. * 1.108 ἐσθλὸν δ’ οὔτέ τί πω εἶπας ἔπος οὔ τ’ ἐτέλεσσας : #narrator Agamemnon feels #neg aggression, anger, complaint for Calchas. * 1.110 ἄλγεα : #lex this expresses pain.

* 1.114 κουριδίης ἀλόχου : #lex this expresses #quite_pos desire, lust. * πολὺ ... 1.113 ἔχειν : #narrator Agamemnon feels #quite_pos desire, lust, #neg sarcasm. * 1.113 Κλυταιμνήστρης ... 1.114 ἀλόχου: #narrator Agamemnon feels #quite_pos desire, lust, #neg sarcasm. * 1.116 ὧς ... ἄμεινον : #narrator Agamemnon feels #quite_pos willingness, self_denial, remorse. * 1.117 βούλομ’ ... ἀπολέσθα : #narrator Agamemnon feels #quite_pos self_denial, bravery. * 1.118 ἐμοὶ ... ἑτοιμάσατ’ : #narrator Agamemnon expresses #neu request, pride. * 1.118 μὴ ... 1.119 ἔω : #narrator Agamemnon expresses #quite_neg complaint.

* 1.123 πῶς γάρ τοι δώσουσι γέρας μεγάθυμοι Ἀχαιοί; : this expresses #neu question. * 1.126 οὐκ ἐπέοικε : #lex this expresses #neg rejection. #narrator Achilles feels reproach for Agamemnon. * 1.127 ἀλλὰ σὺ μὲν νῦν τήνδε θεῷ πρόες : this expresses #neu request. * 1.127 θεῷ : #narrator Achilles, #character Agamemnon feels #pos respect. * 128 αἴ ... 1.129 ἐξαλαπάξα : #narrator Achilles feels #pos expectation, hope.

* 1.131 ἀγαθός : #lex this expresses #pos bravery. #narrator Agamemenon expresses #pos acknowledgement, admiration. * 1.131 μὴ ~ 1.132 κλέπτε νόῳ : #narrator Agamemnon expresses #neg rejection, anger for Achilles. * 1.131 οὐ ... πείσεις : #narrator Agamemnon expresses #neg rejection. * 1.133 ἐθέλεις ... 1.134 δευόμενον: #narrator Agamemnon feels #quite_neg complaint, injustice, jealousy for Achilles. * 1.137 εἰ ... ἕλωμα : #narrator Agamemnon expresses #neg threat, aggression. * 1.139 κεχολώσεται : #lex this expresses #neg anger, provocation.

* 1.142 ἑκατόμβην 1.143 θείομεν : #lex this expresses #pos respect, piety. * 1.146 πάντων ἐκπαγλότατ’ ἀνδρῶν : #lex this expresses #pos respect, admiration. * 1.147 ἱλάσσεαι : #lex this expresses #quite_pos appeasement, #quite_neg remorse, guilt, submission. * 1.148 ὑπόδρα ἰδὼν : #lex this expresses #quite_neg reproach, hate, anger. #character Achilles feels #quite_neg reproach, hate, anger. * 1.149 ὤ μοι : #lex this expresses #neg indignation, exasperation, anger. * 1.149 ὤ μοι ... κερδαλεόφρον : #narrator Achilles feels #neg exasperation, disdain, anger. * 1.150 πῶς ... 1.151 μάχεσθαι : #narrator Achilles expresses question, sarcasm for Agamemnon.

* 1.161 ἀπειλεῖς : #lex this expresses threat. * 1.162 ᾧ ἔπι πολλὰ μόγησα : #narrator Achilles feels #pos justice. * 1.163 οὐ ... γέρας : #narrator Achilles expresses #quite_neg complaint for Agamemnon. * 1.165 ἀλλὰ ... 1.166 διέπουσ’: #narrator Achilles feels #pos pride, #neg injustice. * 1.167 σοὶ ... μεῖζον : #narrator Achilles feels #neg injustice, complaint for Agamemnon. * 1.167 ὀλίγον ... τε₁ : #narrator Achilles feels #neg complaint, #neg injustice, #pos gratitude.

* 1.171 ἄτιμος : #narrator Achilles, #lex this expresses dishonour, disrespect, rejection. * 1.173 θυμὸς ἐπέσσυτα : #character Achilles, #lex this expresses #neg homesickness. * 1.174 λίσσομαι : #narrator Agamemnon, #lex this expresses #neu request, plead. * 1.175 τιμήσουσι : #lex this expresses #pos respect. * 1.176 ἔχθιστος : #lex, #narrator Agamemnon expresses #neg hostility, disdain for Achilles. * 1.177 αἰεὶ ... τε₂ : #narrator Agamemnon feels #neg disdain, reproach for Achilles. * 1.178 μάλα καρτερός ἐσσι : #narrator Agamemnon feels #pos acknowledgement, admiration. * 1.180 οὐκ ἀλεγίζω : #lex this expresses #quite_neg dispassion.

* 1.203 ὕβριν : #lex this expresses #neg impiety, pride. * 1.205 ὑπεροπλίῃσι : #lex this expresses #neg pride, confidence. * 1.205 ὀλέσσῃ : #character Achilles feels #neg worry, justice, threat. * 1.207 μένος : #lex this expresses #neg anger, rage. * 1.207 παύσουσα ... μένος : #narrator Athena feels empathy, worry for Achilles. * 1.209 φιλέουσά : #lex this expresses #pos affection, love, compassion. * 1.209 κηδομένη : #lex this expresses #pos affection, love, compassion. * 1.210 ἔριδος : #lex this expresses #neg aggression, anger, grudge, hostility. * 1.210 ξίφος ἕλκεο χειρί : #character Achilles expresses #neg threat.
